divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching this for about two hrs in lowell Massachusetts on the pawtucket blvd. unfortunatley I only got to record about 10 min of it. This thing was moving back and fourth made no sound dropped so low was in the tree line. It also put a light down on the ground atleast 3 times that I seen. It was like a helicopter spot light but it never moved like a heli.
Summary: Was in the air for about two hrs I finally had to go home and get my cam!!!
